description: KuberhealthyState represents the data in the CRD for configuring an the state of khjobs or khchecks for Kuberhealthy

In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

spec.description: Spec holds the desired state of the KuberhealthyState (from the client).

khWorkload.description: KHWorkload is used to describe the different types of kuberhealthy workloads: KhCheck or KHJob
